titles.title: Go Before O Lord and Fight The Battle For Me

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Those who hate my soul are strong. Let me hear the battle song. Go before, O Lord, and fight my battle for me. I wait for You, it is my part. Strengthen now, O Lord my heart Go before, O Lord, and fight my battle for me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Go before O Lord and fight the battle for me I’m Your servant Lord, O show Your glory to me I fear neither pain nor loss, I have taken up my cross Go before O Lord and fight the battle for me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I get weary in the day. Mighty Captain be my stay Go before O Lord and fight the battle for me As the battle rages on, Keep me looking towards the dawn Go before O Lord and fight the battle for me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Go before O Lord and fight the battle for me I’m Your servant Lord, O show Your glory to me I fear neither pain nor loss, I have taken up my cross Go before O Lord and fight the battle for me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I’m exhausted in the fight. (In the gritty, sweaty fight {alternate words}) Show Yourself upon the heights. Go before, O Lord, and fight my battle for me. When it’s dark and there’s no light Be my vision in the night Go before OLordand fight my battle for me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Go before O Lord and fight the battle for me I’m Your servant Lord, O show Your glory to me I fear neither pain nor loss, I have taken up my cross Go before O Lord and fight the battle for me{/lang-eng}
